title: Akata Witch

description: A Nigerian-American girl discovers she is a Leopard Person with magical powers.

title: Zahrah the Windseeker
author: Nnedi Okorafor
description: Zahrah navigates a fantastical jungle with unique flora and fauna.

title: Rosewater

description: A city in Nigeria thrives around an alien biodome with psychic phenomena.

title: Kafka on the Shore

title: 1Q84
